item.title: Shortcut to ChIP-seq analysis
item.author: Author
item.description: bowtie2-macs2-deeptools 2.1 Genome mapping Step 0: install software 1 2 # install miniconda, then call conda conda install -c bioconda bowtie2 hisat2 samtools deeptools step 1: build index 1 bowtie2-build hg38.fa bowtie2_index/hg38 step 2: mapping Unpaired data 1 2 3 bowtie2 -p ${threads} -x index/hg38 \ -U input.
